name: Blobber
overview: This is a pretty good Bubble Bobble clone but a lot tougher as you have to collect a certain amount of items to complete each level (unless you're lucky to have a key appear, opening the exit) and the nasties regenerate, often in unexpected places. Computer 1989/03, Published in both 64'er Sonderheft 61, and in 64'er 1999/08.
